entities.name: clocks
entities.description: The text describes clocks as 'gleaming from every surface' and 'hanging in spaces between the bookcases or standing on desks'. The clocks are also described as making a 'busy, relentless ticking' sound.

entities.name: grandfather clock
entities.description: The text mentions a 'grandfather and carriage', which is likely referring to a grandfather clock. It is described as standing on a desk.

entities.name: carriage
entities.description: The text mentions a 'grandfather and carriage', which is likely referring to a piece of furniture. It is not clear what type of carriage it is.

entities.name: crystal bell jar
entities.description: The text describes the crystal bell jar as 'towering' and standing at the far end of the room. It appears to be full of a 'billowing, glittering wind'.

entities.name: Harry
entities.description: The text mentions Harry's heart pumping frantically as he leads the way forward.

entities.name: Ginny
entities.description: The text mentions Ginny pointing at the crystal bell jar and saying 'Oh look!'

entities.name: desk
entities.description: The text describes desks as standing along the length of the room.

relationships.description: Harry leads the way forward down the narrow space between the lines of the desks, heading for the source of the light, the crystal bell jar.
Ginny points at the very heart of the bell jar.
